casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rabon Earl BUTLER. No. 557P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of November 2007 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

*489"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008."
